title: Diamond ADC main looking for a r5 team
body:
Ign: Kami Dule

Champion pool: Kalista, vayne, cait, tris, lucian, twitch, ashe, jinx, sivir

Looking for a team that commits and wants to climb pref at least the same rank as me.

Add me

replies.body:
Hi there Kami Dule! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
